channel.title: Compiler help?
channel.description: I cant run any cmpiler... i get "You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates. Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for step-by-step instructions to download the newest JDK Update. Press any key to continue . . ." and i have the java files jdk1.6.0_04, jre1.6.0_03, and jre1.6.0_04, i dunno , but i think these r jdk1 O-o if they r jdk6 plzz help x.X

item.title: Compiler help?
item.dc:creator: @AlucFahh AlucFahh
item.description:
@AlucFahh wrote:

yea i got update 4 O_O and I can’t get 2 >.> cuz I wanna like run it were I can make my char admin (i wont be hostin it, but mess around with stuff, like change item stats =p) and mess with stuffz

EDIT: how do I edit an item config file, but keepanother with the original stats? O_O OH also, i run the unedited compiler thats also here, and i type run init( it’s called Pureman0194’s Perfect Compiler) and it say
:: Port:
:: 43594
:: Running using JDK 1.6.0_04…
RichScape v2 - Created by Rich

Loading npcs… drops… spawn list…done!

But The client itself don’t open, it I can get help on that also? XD

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help?

item.description:
@Random666 wrote:

he says he’s got update 4

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

try these 2:

@echo off COLOR 09 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

or

@echo off COLOR 09 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help?
item.dc:creator: @AlucFahh AlucFahh
item.description:
@AlucFahh wrote:

now I get, “‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .” it’z no workz O-o

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help?
item.dc:creator: @Random666 Random666
item.description:
@Random666 wrote:

edit your compiler to:

@echo off COLOR 0b javac -cp . *.java pause

That way you dont need to change directory

Read full topic

uhh in teh java folder? XD, and thats in program files, and wats wit teh code? O-o also i tried to run rich scapes v4 compiler, but it failed also x.X i think wit wokred on compileing, but not running any help plz?
